questions.text: Before becoming a Power Ranger, Jason was a star athlete. What sport did he play?
questions.explanation:
Football.

	Jason Lee Scott was the star quarterback for his high school team. In an early scene in the movie he was shown in the locker room with his equipment and teammates. Later on, after crashing his truck in a police chase, his father yelled at him while he was being dropped off to Saturday detention. Mr. Scott told Jason that he had it all coming to him, scouts coming to see him play and everything, then he ruined it. Dacre Montgomery played Jason in the movie.

questions.correct: She punched a boy in the face.
options: She mouthed off to a teacher.
She was framed for cheating on a test.
questions.explanation:
She punched a boy in the face.

	Kimberly had allegedly taken a "bad" picture of a cheerleading teammate and passed it around the school. She denied doing it early in the movie. When her mother and father confronted her in their car, she did admit to punching "that boy" in the face.  Naomi Scott played Kimberly in the movie.

questions.text: Which of the five rangers was autistic?
questions.explanation:
Billy.

	Billy, played by RJ Cyler, was the blue ranger in the movie. He was an inventor and science nerd. He told Jason during one scene that he was "on the spectrum", meaning autistic. Billy saw Jason as a friend and opened up to him more than the others after Jason stopped a bully from picking on him.

questions.text: Did the green ranger appear in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Rita Repulsa was shown to be the green ranger during the opening scenes of the movie. During that time she was a member of a 6 ranger team, and had turned evil. She killed the rest of her team, including Zordon who was shown to hold the red ranger powers at that time. Zordon hid the five power coins from the rangers who didn't turn evil. Rita lost her coin when she was knocked into the ocean, though when she awoke millions of years later, she seemed to have the coin once again.

questions.text: What was the name of the high school where the rangers attended?
questions.explanation:
Angel Grove.

	Angel Grove was written all over the school and on a flier hanging on Jason's refrigerator showing his former football skills. The school colors were light blue and white. The TV show the movie was based on was also set in Angel Grove. Angel Grove's mascot was the Tiger.

questions.text: Where did Billy ask Jason to take him?
questions.explanation:
A Gold Mine.

	When they got in the minivan Billy made Jason swing a seashell that was hanging from the rear view mirror. When they got to the mine, which was a place Billy and his dad frequented before he died, there were signs everywhere that said "Do Not Enter". Jason protested, but took Billy inside anyway.

questions.text: What was the name of the robot that assisted Zordon and the rangers?
questions.explanation:
Alpha 5.

	Alpha 5 was Zordon's assistant and robotic friend. Early in the movie Alpha assisted Zordon in helping to defeat Rita Repulsa and later he helped the rangers as they trained and learned to use their powers and work together.  Alpha 5 was voiced by Bill Hader.

questions.text: Which other ranger's name did Kimberly not know before they became rangers?
questions.explanation:
Trini.

	In the TV show the movie was based on the two were close friends who then became rangers. In the movie Kimberly was portrayed as a stuck up girl who didn't know anyone that was below her stature as a cheerleader. Much of the movie goes about showing Kimberly's redemption as a person. There was a scene, the morning after the rangers found the power coins, where Trini asked Kimberly if she even knew her name and Kimberly couldn't answer until after Trini told Kimberly her name. Trini was played by musician Becky G.

	Zack was played by Ludi Lin. Zack Taylor was the black ranger. Trini was the yellow ranger, Billy the blue ranger, Kimberly the pink ranger and Jason the red ranger. In the TV series Zack was of African American descent, in this movie he was Asian but there was still a scene after he got his power coin where he announced to the team that he was black.

questions.text: Who was the team leader at first?
questions.explanation:
Jason.

	Much like he had been the captain of the football team, Jason became the leader of the power rangers. In the confines of the TV series the movie was based on the red rangers were normally the leaders. That held true in the movie, with Zordon even officially announcing to Jason that he was the leader. Zordon told Jason that he was born for the job as the team leader.
